Title: Episode Two
Plot: Finn isn't quite as innocent as he looks when a dark secret he's been hiding at home is revealed. Can Seth be persuaded to come out of retirement and take a power before someone gets forced into submission? And Rudy and Curtis go into battle over a beautiful blind girl, while Jess meets new super-sexy barman Alex.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
